description: A 27-year-old ninja and member of the Kairoushuu who acts as a squad leader on missions. He lives with Yoite, and is protective of him, caring for him as his health degenerates. He is also a comrade of Raikou, who occasionally goes out on mission with Yukimi and addresses him as a senior. While he tries to act cool, he is also known for childish outbursts, which are usually directed at Raikou.
name: Yukimi Kazuhiko
